successes.title: Gigabot 3D Printing: This is Huge!
successes.description: Dream big, print big! Affordable, large-format 3D printing for your home or business.

Pledges.description: "A BIG Thank You!" to ALL Supporters: Every contribution gets a personal shout out on our website with a link you'd like to share with our community.
You like flair and so do we. Get a shout out plus your very own limited edition sticker & T-shirt to show your support for our flagship technology.
Get your very own 8'' diameter vase or equivalently awesome object, T-shirt and sticker.
As seen on Kickstarter: Receive a sample large format 16'' 3D vase built by one of our prototyping units and signed by our team members. Also includes T-shirt and sticker.

Celebrate and Learn: Design your own print and join the re:3D team for our official Austin launch party and 5 hour hands-on Gigabot workshop where you can meet other large format makers and experience a detailed tutorial of the design.Travel not included.

Build big with a complete Gigabot dynamic frame for your own large format personal factory (everything EXCEPT electronics and motors), T-shirt, sticker and 5 lbs of PLA filament. Includes shipping to anywhere in the continental United States - international shipping will be extra. See FAQ for details.

Everything's in the box! 
All of the parts and instructions you need to build your own fully functional Gigabot.                                    Includes: T-shirt, sticker, 5 lbs of PLA filament.

Everything's in the box!
All of the parts & instructions you need to build your own fully functional Gigabot! Includes: T shirt, sticker, 5 lbs of PLA filament and shipping to anywhere in the continental US - international shipping will be extra. See FAQ for details.

Everything's in the box! All of the parts & instructions you need to build your own fully functional Gigabot! Includes: T shirt, sticker, 5 lbs of PLA filament and shipping to anywhere in the continental US - international shipping will be extra. See FAQ for details.

Everything's in the box! All of the parts & instructions you need to build your own fully functional Gigabot! Includes: T shirt, sticker, 5 lbs of PLA filament and shipping to anywhere in the continental US - international shipping will be extra. See FAQ for details.

Everything's in the box! All of the parts & instructions you need to build your own fully functional Gigabot! Includes: T shirt, sticker, 5 lbs of PLA filament and shipping to anywhere in the continental US - international shipping (customs/duty/taxes/etc.) will be extra. See FAQ for details.

On-site Demo/Installation and Training Class: Receive an 8 hour in person large format printing workshop demonstration for 5 people. While onsite re:3D will also calibrate & install any kits purchased during our Kickstarter campaign. (This prize level does not include hardware). To be arranged between September and January).
Print your world: Receive a tested and flat-packed Gigabot. Minimal assembly and calibration required. Yes the swag comes too:)

Print your world: Receive a tested and flat-packed Gigabot. Minimal assembly and calibration required. Includes: T shirt, sticker, 5 lbs of PLA filament and shipping to anywhere in the continental US - international shipping will be extra. See FAQ for details.

Print your world: Receive a tested and flat-packed Gigabot. Minimal assembly and calibration required. Includes: T shirt, sticker, 5 lbs of PLA filament and shipping to anywhere in the continental US - international shipping will be extra. See FAQ for details.

Volume Special! Everything's in the box!  All of the parts & instructions you need to build TWO fully functional Gigabots! Includes: T shirt, sticker, 5 lbs of PLA filament and shipping to anywhere in the continental US - international shipping (customs/duty/taxes/etc.) will be extra. See FAQ for details.

Volume Special! Everything's in the box! All of the parts & instructions you need to build THREE fully functional Gigabots! Includes: T shirt, sticker, 5 lbs of PLA filament and shipping to anywhere in the continental US - international shipping (customs/duty/taxes/etc.) will be extra. See FAQ for details.

Let's work together to make it your own! Your fully assembled bot will have a customized frame and platform. Additionally, we will engrave your companyâ€™s name or logo prominently engraved on all units sold in 2013 and you know the drill, you get all the swag with 10 lbs of PLA filament. Includes shipping to anywhere in the world.
